duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and cultivate relationships with ‘top-75’ installers to grow the customer platform and increase market share.
Responsible for strategic business planning and execution of sales plans.
Build and maintain strategic relationships with customers, channel partners, and industry influencers.
Measure, analyze, and report sales performance against targets by customer, channel, product family, and geography.
Identify competitive trends, provide technical support to customers, and assist in market research for future products and services.
Develop strategies for partnerships and business relationships with solar racking, PV module, and roofing manufacturers, and other affiliated solar organizations.
Review and adjust sales forecast and set performance goals accordingly.
Prepare annual sales budget and conduct quarterly reviews.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor Degree in Business or related field (Master's preferred)
